alert.note: Alert for Ector; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 10:44PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN ECTOR AND SOUTHEASTERN WINKLER COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 PM CDT... At 1044 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Monahans, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... West Odessa and Penwell. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 93 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for western Texas.
